meanings.definition: To eject liquid in a thin stream
meanings.sent1: The water squirted from the hose.
meanings.sent2: She squirted ketchup on her fries.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat squirted the water gun at the dog.
meanings.sent4: The volcano squirted lava into the air.
meanings.sent5: The juice squirted out of the orange when squeezed.

meanings.definition: To shoot out suddenly in a stream
meanings.sent1: The lemon squirted juice when squeezed.
meanings.sent2: The whale squirted water from its blowhole.
meanings.sent3: The clown squirted water from a fake flower.
meanings.sent4: The burst pipe squirted water all over the floor.
meanings.sent5: The chef squirted chocolate sauce on the dessert.

meanings.definition: To cause liquid to be ejected in a thin stream
meanings.sent1: She squirted soap onto the sponge.
meanings.sent2: The bartender squirted lemon juice into the cocktail.
meanings.sent3: The prankster squirted mustard on the sandwich.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic squirted oil into the engine.
meanings.sent5: The doctor squirted medicine into the patient's mouth.
